data: Nicolas (17) und ich (Joël 18) machen uns nach der Ausbildung  per ende Juli Vollzeit selbständig. Wir haben eine Marketing Agentur und sind spezialisiert auf Short Form Content. Unser Ziel ist es ein komplett Anbieter für Social Media mit all unseren Services für unternehmen zu sein.

A Wheelchair That Climbs Stairs
Stairs, curbs, mud and gravel are limiting obstacles for people in wheelchairs. A startup from Winterthur wants to redefine life for people with impaired mobility.

Scewo developed the wheelchair “Scewo BRO” that drives on two big wheels for agile maneuvering on the spot and dynamic driving over common obstacles. It comes with different modes, one of which even allows climbing stairs: Upon approaching steps, two rubber tracks under the wheelchair are extended. The chair’s seat is kept level at all time. The transitions on and off the stairs are automated. The same tracks can be used to offer more traction when navigating on slippery surfaces or to overcome bigger obstacles and steep inclines. Another interesting mode is the “Elevated Mode” in which the seat can be elevated to enable eye-to-eye communication and a better reach. “Scewo BRO” uniquely combines agility and stability and the software developers are working hard to increase the level of automatization, to help detect critical situations and to drive certain distances autonomously.

Als modern geführte Software Agentur, wollen den technologischen Fortschritt mitgestalten, indem wir Visionen gekonnt in High-End Software umwandeln. Dabei agieren wir als vertrauenswürdiger Teil eines Teams und streben stets danach, im besten Interesse zu handeln. Wir begleiten Software Startups ab Tag eins und helfen ihnen dabei, ihre Idee erfolgreich auf den Markt zu bringen.

Wir sind authentisch, unermüdlich und kümmern uns um unsere Kunden. Durch unsere Expertise in Business und Technologie, fördern wir Wachstum und Innovation. Für unsere Kunden bedeutet das ein verlässlicher Service, damit sie es gleich beim ersten Mal richtig machen.

With a lot of passion, sound business knowledge and my passion for brand management and product development, I launched the first vegan and sustainably certified condom brand in Switzerland in March 2023: feelgood Condoms. I have been working in the field of sexual health for over 10 years and my goal is to make love life more sustainable.

Numarics is a fintech early stage startup redefining the fiduciary landscape for SMEs with its unique AI-driven SaaS platform and a mobile App, blending advanced technology with human expertise to offer integrated solutions in accounting, tax advisory, audit, and payroll services. Our commitment to innovation, data security, and expert-backed customer support empowers businesses with streamlined, efficient, and compliant financial management tools, tailored for the modern digital economy.

The company name is Yede AG. I participated in Startup Night 2022 to showcase my idea of a multi-width shoe. Due to family reasons, I paused the business in 2023. The shoe was finally launched in early 2024, but due to unclear customer positioning and some product design issues, sales were not ideal.

Based on the feedback I received from the initial sales and some market research, I plan to pivot the business. The new USP will be simpler and clearer: to create the most comfortable shoe for long-standing by utilizing state-of-the-art shoe technology and focusing on one thing - making the shoe shape like the foot for better fitting. By doing so, I plan to create a shoe that is more comfortable than your favorite slipper and can still be worn everywhere.

The prototype is currently under development and will be ready soon. I also plan to launch a crowdfunding campaign on Kickstarter in September to raise money for the production of the initial batch.

Additionally, the company name will be changed to Folg (Folgen der Fussform). This is why the logo and website are not yet ready.

Imagine being able to manage all your company data conveniently on over 40 platforms, effortlessly control your content marketing on social media and your own website, and have all your reviews clearly organized in one place – all this is offered by smt-LISTINGS with just one login.

Founded in 2020, our startup smt-LISTINGS has already helped many companies in Switzerland enhance their online presence. Our software simplifies updating your data and allows you to publish changes simultaneously on all major platforms. Whether it's on TomTom, Apple Maps, or Google – you ensure that your customers can find you everywhere and also improve your Google search results. This saves not only time but also a lot of headaches.

Additionally, with every purchase of a smt-LISTINGS license, you also support the "Buy Food With Plastic" foundation, which helps promote important social projects.
Artificial Intelligence, Marketing & AdTech, Hardware & Software

Das Revenue Navigator Collective (RNC) ist ein Zusammenschluss von ausgewählten, hervorragenden und herzlichen Subject Matter Experts. Das pragmatische sowie interdisziplinäre Expertenteam unterstützt langfristig wenige, auserlesene B2B Startups & Scale-ups mit einem einzigartigem Ansatz bei der Erreichung ihrer gewünschten Business Outcomes. Von der Diagnose der Revenue-Herausforderungen über Key-Deal Coaching für Gründer bis hin zu Training von jungen Sales Talenten.

Wir bei RNC sind nicht einfach nur ein weiteres Beratungsunternehmen im Startup & Scale-up Bereich, sondern ein langfristiger Partner, welcher wirklich die Extrameile für deinen Erfolg geht. Deswegen nehmen wir nur wenige, auserlesene Projekte an, um den von dir verdienten Fokus gewährleisten zu können. Zudem arbeiten unsere Experten eng zusammen, tauschen wichtige Erkenntnisse aus und koordinieren die Tätigkeiten, um eine einwandfreie Project Delivery sicherzustellen.

Nimm Kurs hin zu deinem Erfolg mit dem Revenue Navigator Collective! Unser Ansatz:
-Interdisziplinäres Sales-Experten Netzwerk
-Massgeschneiderte Dienstleistung
-Kompetente Project Delivery
-Langfristige Zusammenarbeit

Unsere fünf Formate um deine Business Outcomes effektiv und nachhaltig zu erreichen:
-Diagnose mit dem St. Galler Revenue Audit
-Coaching
-Consulting
-Hands-on Training
-Business Angel Engagement
Funding / Alternative Finance, E-Commerce & Online Marketplaces, Education, Enterprise Software

RELiYOO is taking the pressure off by offering revolutionary anti-decubitus seating solutions that permanently relieve and monitor pressure.

We develop, manufacture, and sell revolutionary anti-decubitus seating solutions that provide permanent relief and monitor pressure on the buttocks. The technology is designed to make a significant difference in pressure ulcer prevention and treatment for wheelchair users. Our mission is to completely relieve the pressure for people with limited mobility while they are sitting to prevent the occurrence of pressure sores, true to our motto, 'Taking the Pressure Off'.

Visit us at our booth, have a seat, and experience our LiVE - Pressure Ulcer Prevention.
Digital Health, Healthcare, Medtech & Pharma, Wellbeing

painbreaker bietet Menschen mit chronischen Schmerzen Unterstützung durch einen Online-Kurs. Der Kurs besteht aus Video-Sequenzen, Audio-Dateien mit Mentalübungen, einem Workbook und wird durch eine Standortbestimmung evaluiert. Er umfasst Basiswissen zur Schmerzentstehung und themenspezifische Kurse, die Schmerzen mit Alltagsproblemen wie z.B. Stress und Bewegung verbinden. Der Kurs bietet flexible Selbsttherapie, Anonymität und wissenschaftlich fundiertes Wissen, erklärt von einer Physiotherapeutin.

We help companies create stunning web applications in just hours, without any coding. With Elwis, our innovative web application builder, you can launch your custom app quickly and easily, saving time, effort, and cost. No technical skills required.

livCloud offers a All-in-One Swiss cloud solution, particularly suitable for small and medium-sized businesses. With a strong focus on automation, IT security, and high performance, this solution enables a modern and highly available IT environment in the cloud.

Through an intuitive self-service portal, customers gain full control over their IT environment. New users can be added, blocked, or deactivated, and invoices, current support tickets, and the status of systems can be viewed. livCloud is customizable and cost-efficient without compromising on quality and security. This all-in-one private cloud solution provides bank-level IT security and is ready for use within 24 hours.

Flexible, user-friendly, and without minimum contract terms, livCloud offers the perfect solution for protecting business-critical data and enabling flexible work. Developed for small and medium-sized businesses, it can be fully adapted to individual company requirements and processes.
Security & Privacy, Enterprise Software, Hardware & Software

Nuuro is an AI-powered app that simplifies personalized nutrition by providing real-time, tailored food recommendations. We are a team of enthusiast researchers and entrepreneurs passionate about exploring and promoting the most innovative scientific and technological ideas and solutions and are pleased to present our Friendly &Safe Electricity (FSE) Project, a project of a unique global scale and benefit for the whole mankind. 
It’s an absolutely new standard of Safe Electricity that neither shocks people nor causes fires, even during short circuits. Conservative thinkers may not believe it, but it’s there, it works and we can show it.
Imagine a world where electricity is as safe as it is essential!
Current electricity standards pose significant risks, from fire hazards to electrical shocks. Short circuits and electric shock leading to fires, damages, injuries and deaths.
According to statistics, short circuits and wiring ignitions are the cause of more than 50% of all fires that do not only result in multi-billions in material damage and significant ecological harm, but also take away tens of thousands of human lives each year, so do electric shocks.
This is a global problem and we have found a solution.
Our project introduces a revolutionary new standard of Safe Electricity designed to not just minimize, but completely eliminate these dangers. We’ve developed an innovative technology that dramatically enhances electrical safety, reduces accidents and protects lives, property and environment.
The new standard of Safe and Friendly Electricity isn’t just a concept; it’s a necessary upgrade for a safer tomorrow. With no doubt it is one of the most important breakthrough solutions of the 21st century. It will affect all the household and industrial electrical equipment worldwide that is going to run on Safe Electricity. Join us in making every home and business a safer place with our advanced, Safe and Friendly Electricity standard.

Relai was founded in 2020 in Zurich by Julian Liniger and Adem Bilican. Our app is designed to be simple and intuitive, allowing anyone to buy and sell Bitcoin within minutes. Relai is a Swiss-licensed financial service provider with over $500 million in trading volume. In 2024, Relai was named one of the fastest-growing startups in Europe, and the company is regularly listed among the top 50 Swiss startups.

We are an innovative Swiss start-up based in Zug that specializes in the sustainable reduction of chronic stress and burnout and the strengthening of resilience. We offer a unique resilience program that tackles the causes directly. Because the real lever to less stress lies not in avoiding stress-inducing situations or in stress management, but in changing how our brain reacts to these situations. Our empirically developed approach fundamentally changes the way in which stress is perceived and processed. This enables the development of strong and lasting resilience, as demonstrated by an fMRI study. We support both private individuals and companies in effectively managing chronic stress and burnout.

Our cloud-based workforce planning software for the healthcare and nursing sectors significantly reduces planning effort, freeing up more time for patient care and boosting employee satisfaction. This actively contributes to relieving nursing staff and addressing the shortage of skilled workers. Our vision is to support the healthcare sector in the long term and create better working conditions for caregivers – for satisfied employees and high-quality patient care.

Ionic Wind is transforming cooling technology with our innovative, solid-state solution that uses electrostatic principles to move air - completely eliminating the need for traditional fans. The rapid increase in computing power within increasingly compact laptops has made efficient and quiet cooling a critical challenge. Traditional mechanical laptop fans have not kept pace with advancements in processor technology. These fans are noisy, inefficient, and bulky, leading to user frustration and drain the battery fast. Our groundbreaking technology provides a quieter, more energy-efficient alternative with a significantly smaller footprint, making it an ideal choice for modern laptops and other compact electronics.
Ionic Wind achieves > 48% greater air propulsion efficiency than conventional fans, all without the drawbacks of moving parts, noise, or energy loss. Ionic Wind dramatically enhances cooling performance by precisely controlling airflow through applied voltage, enabling intelligent heat dissipation controls for a superior end-user experience. Our technology's potential impact has already caught industry leaders' attention, positioning us to replace the last mechanical component in modern computing. This shift will elevate performance and set a new standard for user satisfaction across the industry.
Our immediate goal is to advance the technology of our Empa Spin-Off to a market-ready stage. We are committed to proving its effectiveness in real-world applications and paving the way for widespread adoption in consumer electronics and critical areas like data center servers, where sustainability efforts are still insufficient.
CleanTech, Energy Transition, Consumer Electronics, Hardware & Software
We digitalize ordering and payment in the gastronomy.

We implement an All-In-One Marketing Management System for startups, branded as Unwind MMS. Сyltronic - smarte IO-Link Servo-Aktuatoren für Ihre Maschine
Für Maschinen- und Anlagenbauer mit komplexen und hochstehenden Maschinen, liefern unsere IO-Link Servo-Aktuatoren eine schnelle und kosteneffiziente Lösung: einfache, kompakte und vielseitige Geräte.
Sie suchen eine einfache und smarte Lösung, die Bewegungen in Ihrer Maschine lösen?
Wir wissen, wie es geht!
Cyltronic ist ihr Experte für IO-Link Servo-Aktuatoren. Die intelligenten Antriebe von Cyltronic basieren auf einer hochentwickelten All-In-One-Technologie. Wir setzen alles daran, Maschinenbauer dabei zu unterstützen, die Komplexität zu reduzieren, die Kosten zu senken und die vielseitigen Kundenbedürfnisse zu decken.

SUUBER - Revolutionizing the Cleaning Industry with Technology

SUUBER is an innovative insurtech and marketplace company that connects cleaners and employers in a fully transparent way.
 -> Higher wages for cleaners compared to competitors, ensuring fair compensation.
-> The SUUBER Mobile App simplifies the employment process, removing common hurdles:

  ->Integrated translation feature: Seamless communication between employers and cleaners, regardless of language barriers.

“The world is facing a global mental health crisis that requires action!” In Switzerland, 35% of Generation Z tests positive for mental health problems. If you’re trying to find a therapist for your child, you have to wait up to 12 months. Demand is increasing and the response is inadequate. 
At SwissDTx, we want to reduce waiting time and improve the quality of treatment with our solution. We have built an online collaboration platform for blended psychotherapy. After an initial face-to-face meeting, the patient works on their intervention online using our app. The therapist on the other hand can monitor progress, communicate with the patient or adjust the treatment. To better reach all different patients, we have developed an age-based interface to keep patient engagement as high as possible.

Optohive is transforming brain imaging with patented hardware and proprietary algorithms for data-driven analysis, leveraging the novel fNIRS technology. Our next-generation, wearable devices offer high-reliability and usability, designed for both neuroscience research and clinical applications, providing a flexible, modular solution that enhances data quality and user experience.

DAAV as an EPFL spin-off is on the mission to enhance the quality of travel for people with reduced mobility on the go. We have developed an AI-enabled mobility solution for passengers with reduced mobility in the airport to enable a self-sufficient and efficient service for both the passengers and airports. Our mobility solution, DAAV-air, can move omni-directional, be tele-operated, or move fully autonomous. So far the solution has been tested in Zurich and Vienna airports. We will be happy to show our solution to the participants of the Startup Nights and connect with the participants.
Artificial Intelligence, Mobility Robotics, Smart Cities, Healthcare, Medtech & Pharma, Hardware & Software, Travel & Tourism

Amnis Treasury Services AG simplifies international payments for small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) by providing a platform that offers transparent, cost-effective currency exchange and payment solutions. Time is your most valuable asset.
We are changing the way you will learn in the future!
More time for the things you love.
#AI🤖 #Revolution🚀 #GameChanger🌎
At our core, we believe that learning should evolve to meet the demands of a fast-paced world. We've experienced firsthand how exhausting traditional learning can be, and we're here to revolutionize it.
We challenge outdated beliefs like "hard work before pleasure" and "no pain, no gain." Instead, we're empowering you to learn faster and more efficiently, thanks to cutting-edge AI technology. By transforming how you absorb knowledge, we free up your time for what truly matters — the things you love.
Our mission is to break free from the constraints of old ways of thinking and build a future where learning is intuitive, enjoyable, and sustainable. We're not just about faster learning; we're about creating balance and empowering people to live smarter.

Our vision is to help people with neurological or psychiatric illnesses achieve better health. With a ketogenic diet, people can sometimes reduce or completely stop their medication. We are ahead of our time, as ketogenic metabolic therapy is still new in psychiatry, but there are already many positive case reports and some small studies. Myketobrain is intended to become a tool for nutritionists to recommend to their patients, or for individuals to take responsibility for their own health.

Retaining invaluable expert knowledge.

rimon was founded at ETH Zurich and is changing how manufacturing and service companies retain valuable knowledge. We address the problem of losing expertise when professionals retire or change jobs.

Imagine losing a key team member and their years of experience. rimon captures and digitises this knowledge and ensures that it remains accessible and production delays are avoided.

With rimon, you can easily pass on and retain important expertise.

Research, Inform, Know! The Research Assistant for Libraries "Runa Flow" based on AI technology.

How did it come about?

Libraries have always been important providers of high-quality information. However, it is sometimes not so easy to navigate library catalogs, portals, and websites. Librarians can tell you how often the same standard works are cited in research papers – even though libraries have such a rich treasure of other interesting sources.

What does it offer?

The new technology of "Large Language Models" offers completely new possibilities for research. With "Runa Flow," the Schaffhausen libraries are creating a new access to their offerings that also reaches new and less experienced users. With semantic search, the system better understands the context of a search query. A content-based search in the library's large collection becomes possible, and queries like "Recommend me a crime novel set in Sweden" yield good results. Not only do library visitors benefit from this new search function, but also library staff and researchers can search faster and find more results – even without having to manually tag the collections with keywords.
Artificial Intelligence, Education, Enterprise Software, Social & Communities

At a-metal, our vision is to democratize metal 3D printing within the industry. We firmly believe that small and medium-sized enterprises, educational institutions, and small development groups should have easier access to this revolutionary technology on their premises.

Our closed-loop powder handling cartridge system ensures a clean and safe operation, eliminating the need for hiring academic experts or building a laboratory room around your metal 3D printer. With just a basic mechanical workshop, an innovative mindset, your technical team, and our machine, you can start printing complex metal parts in-house for an affordable price whenever you need them.

Hallo, mein Name ist Viviana Hürlimann und ich bin die Gründerin von Casa
Refill GmbH.
Was hat mich zur Gründung von Casa Refill inspiriert? Mich nervten die Berge von Plastikmull, die täglich im Haushalt anfallen. So entschied ich mich, eine Firma fur nachhaltige Produkte und nachfüllbare Verpackungen zu gründen.
Als Tochter eines Schweizers und einer Mexikanerin, hat mich eine Reise nach Mexiko City mit meiner Familie besonders beeinflusst. Dort, in der malerischen und pulsierenden Colonia Condesa, wo meine Mutter aufgewachsen ist, entdeckten wir einen kleinen Laden, der viele Produkte im Refill-System anbietet. Diese nachhaltige und zeitgemässe Idee liess mich nicht mehr los und inspiriert mich noch heute. Aus dieser Inspiration entstand Casa Refill. Sowohl im Laden in Zürich als auch im Webshop bieten wir ein wachsendes Sortiment an Produkte an, die sowohl in Zürich und in Mexiko hergestellt werden.
Meine Vision ist es, die traditionelle mexikanische Pflanzenmedizin mit der hohen Qualitätsstandards der Schweiz zu verbinden und meine Kund:innen für einen nachhaltigen Lebensstil zu begeistern. Ich freue mich, meine Werte mit teilen zu können und hoffe, Menschen mit meinem Sortiment zu inspirieren und aufzuzelgen, dass man mit einfachen Veränderungen sich selbst und unserem Planeten etwas Gutes tun kann.
Refill your Beauty!

Für was steht Casa Refill?
Casa Refill bietet natürliche und nachhaltige Produkte für Beauty und Haushalt.
Wir verbinden die natürlichen Inhaltsstoffe und die Lebensfreude Mexikos mit den hohen Produktions- und Nachhaltigkeitsstandards der Schweiz. Unsere einzigartigen Produkte verzichten auf Einwegplastik und haben einen positiven Einfluss auf dich und die Umwelt. Refill your Beauty!
Unsere Vision: Wir streben eine Welt an, in der Einwegplastik der Vergangenheit angehort - oder zumindest eine Randerscheinung wird. In unserer Vision ist jedes von uns genutzte Produkt Teil eines zirkulären Systems, in dem nichts verschwendet wird und alles wiederverwendet werden kann.
Unser Motto lässt sich in den 4Rs zusammenfassen: Reuse, Refill, Reduce und Recycle. Und dann natürlich: Repeat - für eine nachhaltigere Zukunft!
Reuse & Refill: Glasflaschen können in unserem Laden unbegrenzt refilled werden. So sparst du Unmengen an Plastik und schenkst deiner Glasflasche ein längeres Leben.
Reduce: Solids statt Plastikflaschen: Unsere Shampoo Bars halten doppelt so lange wie herkömmliche Flaschen. Das bedeutet weniger Rohstoffverbrauch und vollständig plastikfreie Haarpflege.
Recycle: Fast alle Verpackungen bestehen aus kompostierbarer Maisstärke oder recyceltem Karton. Die Kartonagen der Solids werden ebenfalls bald angepasst.
Natürlich schön: Erlebe die natürliche Schönheit durch das traditionelle Pflanzenwissen Mexikos. Wir sind stolz darauf, die exklusive Lizenz für Tepezcohuite, ein wertvolles Heilmittel aus Mexiko, zu besitzen.
Wert 1:
Natürlichkeit: Unsere Produkte splegeln die reine Schönheit und die Kraft der Natur wider, indem wir ausschliesslich natürliche Inhaltsstoffe verwenden.
Wert 2:
Lebensfreude: Unsere Marke verkörpert die lebendige und farbenfrohe Lebensfreude Mexikos, inspiriert von der Leidenschaft und dem Optimismus meiner Kleinigkeit

What would it be to understand the neurobiological patterns in your hand actually MEAN something? Thanks to the advent of 30 years of study in the field of dermatoglyphics, we can affirmatively draw a blueprint of your nervous system. This means that every part of your hands correlate to a different power. By evaluating half a million people by these patterns, the Institute of Hand  Analysis is ready to reveal your entire personality architecture, your shadow side, what triggers you, and most of all how to break through to you greatest potential. This is ideal especially for entrepeneurs who are wanting to know if they're going in the right direcftion to life the life of their dreams, and as well, be aware of their blind spots that will likely sabotage their success.
